alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Camden; Charlton; Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 25 at 4:10PM EDT until March 25 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Camden County in southeastern Georgia... Southwestern Glynn County in southeastern Georgia... Central Brantley County in southeastern Georgia... Northeastern Charlton County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 410 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hickox, or near Nahunta, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Woodbine, Nahunta, Hickox, Waverly, Thalmann, Raybon, Waynesville, Atkinson, Winokur and Tarboro. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
